radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple thin walled cysts in the lungs; no pleural effusion or pneumothorax; pleural based nodular opacity 1.2 x 1.2 cm in the right lower lung; normal imaged heart and no pericardial effusion; two sub-4 mm nodules in left lung base; liver, pancreas, and adrenal glands normal; surgically absent spleen; enlarged kidneys with numerous cystic and fat-containing lesions; surgical clips in both kidneys; non-obstructing 5.8 mm stone in left kidney; normal stomach and bowel; right upper quadrant ventral hernia containing a portion of large bowel; small fat-containing umbilical hernia; dilated appendix (9.8 mm) with surrounding fat inflammation; normal rectum, bladder, and sigmoid; unremarkable uterus; cystic changes in both ovaries; scattered right inguinal lymph nodes do not meet CT criteria for lymphadenopathy; multiple foci of sclerosis in bones with no fractures.
